entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 in a few localities early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
